name: Wii Bowling
description:
A very basic Bowling game, still in development, based off of Wii Sports Resorts Bowling. The download comes with a script (Wii_remote.PIE) that, when run with glovepie, allows you to use a wii remote to play, yet keyboard support is also included.

After running the exe it will take a little while to boot up. The program uses the GPU, so some antiviruses may try to block it - just allow the file.
